#Meta has already registered an "X" logo for use in connection with online social networking services and social networking services in the fields of entertainment, gaming, and application development.

Fun fact: The logo that Elon Musk presented is the "Mathematical Double-Struck Capital X" Unicode character (𝕏 (U+1D54F)). It looks like the DejaVu Sans font, which is free to use for everyone. This means that Musk cannot prevent other people from putting the logo on merchandise and selling it. In fact, Elon Musk is the only man in the world who could make Mark Zuckerberg look cool.
